name: createMuteAction
title: Mute Action Builder
oneLiner: Reactive state manager for muting/unmuting Nostr users
description:
The Mute Action builder provides a simple reactive interface for managing user mutes on Nostr. It integrates with NDK's mute list functionality to provide real-time mute state tracking.

The builder accepts either an NDKUser object or a pubkey string as the target, making it flexible for different use cases. It automatically syncs with the user's mute list and reactively updates when mutes are added or removed.

When calling the mute() function, it intelligently toggles the state - if the user is not muted, it adds them to the mute list; if already muted, it removes them. All mute changes are automatically published to relays.

returns.name: isMuted
returns.description: Whether the target is currently muted

returns.name: mute
returns.description: Toggle mute state - mutes if not muted, unmutes if already muted
